body.p:
Frankfort Apl 24 1863
Genl Finnel
Dr Sr

I brought up a petition from prominent Union men of Graves County asking the promotion of Capt T. B Waller he is now the oldest Capt in 20th Ky Regt. is a good officer brave and industrious, had the Confidence of Genl Nelson and he & his Company was honored at one time as the badge guard of Nelson had he lived Capt Waller would doubtless have been promoted before this.
The resignation of Maj Buckner makes a vacancy in the Regiment I do hope you will confer this appointment on Capt Waller it would gratify his numerous friends and be the reward of merrit
Judge W. K. Williams recommends for promotion Capt. T. B. Waller of 20 Kenty intr
